page.title: 03LOCHGOILHEAD-TOURISM(2)
page.content: For those who prefer a holiday afloat {cabin cruisers}can be hired from {Lochgoil Cruisers. The village has a{bowling green,an {all-weather tennis court and a nine {hole golf course}for the more energetic tourist. {Corrow Riding Centre}runs pony treks daily (either half or full day). Locals and tourists enjoy watching and participating in the{Raft Race}and the {Village Sports.}The Sports culminate in the{Hill Race}and everything stops, including the traffic,as the people line the road to watch the race. {Sheepdog Trials}are held in June and July and feature past winners of One Man and his Dog. A variety of souveniers can be bought in the local shops or from{Goilcraft} where our own{silver}and{goldsmith,} Derek Prescott,produces his wares.
